Template.Description: Creates a family to be included in a symbiosis project.
Template.TargetFolderHint: Choose the symbiosis project folder as target folder.

MacroDefinition.Name: FAMILY_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the family in lower case, without the leading 'family_'. Must not contain whitespace. Example: slope_sensor or thermostat

MacroDefinition.Name: PACKAGE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the package to which the family will be added. Example: vvv_base

MacroDefinition.Name: COPYRIGHT
MacroDefinition.Description: The copyright string for the file headers.

MacroDefinition.Name: HAS_COMMANDS
MacroDefinition.Description: If true, the code for providing commands is added.

MacroDefinition.Name: HAS_SYNCHRONOUS_COMMANDS
MacroDefinition.Description: If true, the code for providing an example synchronous command is added. HAS_COMMANDS must be set to true as well.

MacroDefinition.Name: HAS_ASYNCHRONOUS_COMMANDS
MacroDefinition.Description: If true, the code for providing an example asynchronous command is added. HAS_COMMANDS must be set to true as well.

MacroDefinition.Name: HAS_METABOLICS
MacroDefinition.Description: If true, the code for providing an example metabolic is added.

MacroDefinition.Name: HAS_GENES
MacroDefinition.Description: If true, the code for providing an example gene is added.
